choices: In front of Canterlot High School
Crystal Prep Academy
Inside someone's home
Mall
Canterlot Beach
1.content: From where will our adventure commence?
1.title: Where do we begin?

choices: With a bright orange skinned girl sleeping on her bed
With a bunch of science stuff
That looks like it could belong to a farmer
That could belong to an athlete
Somewhere else
13.content: You wake up and begin stretching out your limbs as you yawned. After which, you adjusted your eyes to the blinding light that illuminates your vision. When it cleared up, you see that you’re in a room that doesn’t belong to you. But that’s not the shocking part. What is the shocking part is that you seemed to be way smaller than you were before. Possibly about three inches or so. Are you dreaming this or something? You pinched yourself and you see that you’re not dreaming at all. How could this happen? You had no idea as you looked to see that you’re in a room...
13.title: Inside someone's home

choices: A nicely furnished room with ballons and hearts on the walpaper
A room with fancy bed and a bunch of sewing supplies sorted neatly into cubbies
A slightly messy room with a few animal magazines strewn on the floor
135.title: Somewhere else

choices: A shadow covers you from behind.
A volleyball comes out of nowhere and almost crushes you
You're scooped up into a bucket of sand
A toddler takes notice of you
You're sat on by a woman
15.content:
You awaken in a bright, sunny place, completely surrounded by soft sand. The sounds of waves crashing down on a shore and people laughing and talking reach your ears, meaning that you're not alone wherever you are. You sit upwards and wipe the sleep out of your eyes, and blearily look around you. Surrounding you on all sides is sand forming into a kind of dip at the bottom of which you rested. You got up and yawned, stretching yourself out in the warm sunlight before looking around inquisitively, Where were you, and how did you get there? You walked up to the sandy slope and jabbed your foot into it, testing to see if it would hold your weight and allow you to climb out of here. When you're satisfied that you won't immediately slide back into the hole, you begin the arduous task of scaling the shallow wall to get to the top and find out where you are.

A few minutes later:

Out of breath, but victorious, you pull yourself up from the hole and observe your surroundings. You're clearly on a beach: you can see the roaring waves breaking on the sandy shore and leaving debris int its wake. All around you are people resting on beach towels, playing volleyball, splashing around in the water and chatting with one another. This fact wouldn't be so weird if

A. Most of them weren't in shades of color that regular humans should definitely NOT be in.
B. Everything wasn't GIGANTIC

You pinch yourself to make sure you're not in a dream and slap yourself for good measure.
The sting of pain assures that, yep, you're awake, and nope, you're not dreaming.

Wherever you are, you are most definitely not in Kansas anymore.

While you're standing there trying to digest all this
15.title: Canterlot Beach

choices: SHe grabs you and takes you to her mother
She keeps you to herself for now
154.content:
https://derpibooru.org/1923008?q=%22wate...
<Buggy?>
A voice suddenly grabs your attention, and when you turn you're surprised to see one of the weird multicolored humans right next to you kneeling in the soft sand. What looked to be a girl toddler was staring directly at you with a curious expression, like she wasn't quite sure what to make of you. You hastily back up as she takes a single step towards you prompting a confused look from your giant ( though obviously not nearly as giant as one of the adults) observer.
<Buggy?> She asks again, this time reaching out a hand. You honestly don't know how to respond. Surely this child means you no harm, and if you're lucky she might just lead you to someone who can help you. Still... your tiny body is quite fragile, and you weren't so sure about committing to being cared for by a little girl. Once again you step back and shake your head, trying to get your point across to the toddler.
She seems persistent though as most toddlers would be, and coniues to reach for you while saying that same phrase again.
<Buggy!>
You sigh and offer up no resistance as she pick you up fully in her palm. The toddler holds you up to her face with a look of glee, ecstatic that she found herself a tiny new friend.

What happens after that?
154.title: A toddler takes notice of you

choices: Try digging your way out
Slide along the curvature of  the fabric to see if you can get out that way
155.content:
https://derpibooru.org/2042925?q=victori...
You have no time to react as a huge bikini clad butt blots out the sun. All you can do is stare in horror as the dark shape descends upon you. You feel the breath get knocked out of you as it finally makes impact, sending sand flying everywhere and crushing you underneath
Distantly you hear a woman's voice call out something, but you can't quite make out what she is saying.
<Water Lily honey, don't wander off too far, ok? This beach is packed and I don't want to lose you in the crowd.>
You can barely breathe, it's quite dark and stifling underneath here and you're surprised that you haven't swallowed any sand, yet. You need to get out of here fast before you suffocate to death.
155.title: You're sat on by a woman

info.brief_description: The city of Canterlot has never been so big
info.description:
A sister story to my other work "Tiny Equestrian Adventures"  for all of you generic high school drama, >nohoooves enthusiasts. You are tiny in a city full of multicolored humans at the mercy of the weather and anyone who manages to pick you up. Dodge soccer balls, feral cats, and horny schoolgirls as you navigate through the labyrinthine streets of Canterlot City.
(To make things easier this takes place after the events of Forgotten Friendship)

Special note: Just like my other story the MC doesn't immediately understand what it is the other characters are saying.
